title: EU artificial intelligence regulation takes effect, sparking new Europe-US clash
subhead: Key parts of the legislation governing artificial intelligence (AI) are coming into force on Saturday, August 2. Washington and American tech giants have not given up on their coordinated offensive against this particular piece of legislation and, more broadly, against European digital regulation.

title: Jeffrey Epstein accomplice Ghislaine Maxwell is moved to a minimum security prison in Texas
subhead: No reason was given for Maxwell's transfer, though the move follows a recent, highly unusual meeting between the Epstein accomplice and a top Justice Department official. The former British socialite is serving a 20-year sentence after being convicted in 2021 of recruiting underage girls for Epstein.

title: Luca de Meo's massive welcome package at Kering
subhead: The former Renault chief could receive a signing bonus of €20 million upon joining the luxury group, along with an annual fixed salary of €2.2 million.

title: In Monaco, chef Marcel Ravin's Creole garden
subhead: 'Chefs' Gardens' (3/5). Since 2022, the Martinique-born chef, who has been awarded two Michelin stars, has planted Caribbean varieties within the Monegasque palace that houses his fine dining restaurant.

title: 'West Berlin became my street': Emine Sevgi Özdamar, Turkish factory worker turned actress
subhead: 'Being 20 in West Berlin' (5/6). Writer, actress and theater director, the now 60-something Emine Sevgi Özdamar arrived in Germany from Turkey as a young woman to work in a factory. Very quickly, the aspiring actress discovered a new way of making theater.

title: Locals in Mexico City rise up against gentrification
subhead: Soaring rents in the Mexican capital have driven hundreds of residents into the streets to protest against property speculation, a shortage of housing and the arrival of 'digital nomads' in certain neighborhoods.

title: The friends who cement their platonic relationships through marriage
subhead: Difficult to quantify because they are often unofficial, unions between friends have been growing. They offer a way to honor friendship at a time when people are challenging the traditional, heteronormative couple and its conventions.
